name: Pending Task Daily Digest
description: If enabled sent to users daily when they have incomplete tasks in their Task Manager.
subject:
#set($numberOfPendingTasks = $__numberTool.integer($numberOfPendingTasks))#set($taskTasks = "#if($numberOfPendingTasks == 1)task#{else}tasks#end")
You have $numberOfPendingTasks $taskTasks to complete in ${__global.productName}.
body:
Dear $__recipient.name,

#set($numberOfPendingTasks = $__numberTool.integer($numberOfPendingTasks)) #set($isAre = "#if( $numberOfPendingTasks == 1)is#{else}are#end") #set($taskTasks = "#if( $numberOfPendingTasks == 1)task#{else}tasks#end") #set($url = "${__global.productUrl}/ui/d/dashboard/task-manager") There $isAre $numberOfPendingTasks $taskTasks waiting for you in your $__global.productName Task Manager.
Use each task's details to finish it on the source, then mark it as complete in ${__global.productName}. To do this work, go to the task manager here, or copy and paste this link into your browser: $url

Thanks,
The $__global.productName Team
